item.title: Computer Science as a Medicine
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction It was November 2019 and I was on the plane flying to another country. I was going to move there. This was something far outside my comfort zone, and I was a bit terrified. I knew that I would have to deal with a stream of new challenges, and this made me a bit anxious. I started reading a computer science book I had bought for my trip. The title was ”Algorithms to Live By”.

item.title: Why I occasionally go off the grid
item.author: Author
item.description: A great day for scrolling It’s a great day outside. The sun is up. The weather is good and you are enjoying this relaxing day. Suddenly, you hear a beeping sound. It’s your phone notifying you of a new message. You text back and you put your phone back in your pocket. Another sound. Yay! Someone new followed you on Twitter. “Let’s see who this is!” You tell yourself. You open the app and start scrolling.
